analysis.description:
LockedTokens.releaseTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#231-245) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,walletTokens[msg.sender][i].amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#243-244)

TheEvolthDAICO.forceCrowdsaleRefund (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#882-885) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishIssuance() (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#885)

TheEvolthDAICO.finalizeCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#888-911) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishIssuance() (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol)
	-token.finishIssuance() (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol)

LockedTokens.releaseTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,walletTokens[msg.sender][i].amount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#243-244)

Reentrancy in TheEvolthDAICO.addToLists (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#810-823):
	External calls:
	- token.addLimitedWalletAddress(_wallet) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#817-821)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- additionalBonusOwnerState (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#821-823)

Reentrancy in TheEvolthDAICO.processPayment (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#866-881):
	External calls:
	- token.issue(contributor,tokenTotalAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#872-873)
	- fund.processContribution.value(etherAmount)(contributor) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#873-876)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fund.processContribution.value(etherAmount)(contributor) (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#873-876)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalEtherContributed (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#876-877)
	- userTotalContributed (/unique_chucks/22/0x75b155566888ecb492b725a1babe804e43e39730.sol#877-880)
